title: Will new burial and cremation legislation be fit for modern Scotland? (Scottish Parliament)
text: ( Source : Scottish Parliament ) ShareThis Facebook Email 20.10. 2015 Measures aimed at creating a modern and comprehensive framework for burials and cremations are to be examined by two Scottish Parliament committees. The Health and Sport
